data.descriptionEn: These phrases should be used in daily life and you will use them most of the time.
data.descriptionRu: Эти фразы следует использовать в повседневной жизни, и вы будете использовать их большую часть времени.
data.descriptionKz: Бұл тіркестер күнделікті өмірде қолданылуы керек және сіз оларды көп жағдайда қолданасыз.

phrases.whenToUseRu: Когда приветствуете кого-то старшего или в формальной обстановке.
phrases.usageEn: A formal greeting.
phrases.whenToUseEn: When greeting someone older or in a formal setting.

phrases.whenToUseRu: Когда хотите узнать, как у кого-то дела.
phrases.usageEn: To ask someone how they are doing.
phrases.whenToUseEn: When you want to check on someone’s well-being.

phrases.usageEn: An informal greeting.
phrases.whenToUseEn: Used with friends or in casual settings.

phrases.usageEn: Morning greeting.
phrases.whenToUseEn: When meeting someone in the morning.

phrases.usageEn: Evening greeting.
phrases.whenToUseEn: When greeting someone in the evening.

phrases.usageEn: Used in Islamic culture.
phrases.whenToUseEn: When greeting in Muslim tradition.

phrases.usageRu: Чтобы узнать, все ли в порядке.
phrases.usageEn: To ask about someone's well-being.
phrases.whenToUseEn: After not seeing someone for a while.

phrases.usageKz: Көмек көрсеткенде немесе жақсылық жасағанда айтылады.
phrases.usageEn: Said when showing appreciation.
phrases.whenToUseEn: Used when someone helps or does something kind.

phrases.usageRu: Используется в формальной или письменной форме.
phrases.usageEn: Used in speeches or formal contexts.
phrases.whenToUseEn: When making formal acknowledgments.

phrases.usageRu: Когда вы хотите выразить сильную благодарность.
phrases.usageEn: Used for deeper or heartfelt thanks.
phrases.whenToUseEn: When someone goes out of their way to help.

phrases.usageKz: Көмекке немесе жағдайға ризашылық білдіру үшін.
phrases.usageEn: To show appreciation or satisfaction.
phrases.whenToUseEn: When expressing thanks in a calm manner.

phrases.usageEn: Used in formal letters or speeches.
phrases.whenToUseEn: To express formal appreciation.

phrases.usageEn: Used to show deep gratitude.
phrases.whenToUseEn: When someone’s help was invaluable.

phrases.usageKz: Адамның жасаған жақсылығына ризашылық білдіріп, есте сақтауға уәде беру.
phrases.usageEn: Used when you want to express lasting appreciation.
phrases.whenToUseEn: When the help meant a lot to you.

phrases.usageKz: Кешірім сұрағанда немесе біреудің назарын аударғанда.
phrases.usageRu: Когда хотите извиниться или привлечь внимание.
phrases.usageEn: Used for apologies or polite attention-seeking.
phrases.whenToUseEn: Before asking questions or when bumping into someone.

phrases.usageEn: Used to politely request something.
phrases.whenToUseEn: When making a respectful or polite request.

phrases.example: Ішке кірсем бола ма? Рұқсат па?
phrases.usageEn: Used to ask for permission politely.
phrases.whenToUseEn: Before entering or taking an action.

phrases.usageKz: Қонақты қарсы алғанда немесе жол бергенде.
phrases.whenToUseRu: Приглашая кого-либо в дом или помещение.
phrases.usageEn: Used when inviting someone in or greeting warmly.
phrases.whenToUseEn: Welcoming a guest or showing respect.

phrases.whenToUseRu: Во время официальной или учтивой просьбы.
phrases.usageEn: To respectfully ask someone to do something.
phrases.whenToUseEn: When asking politely in a formal setting.

phrases.example: Мазалағаным үшін кешіріңіз, бірақ бір сұрағым бар.
phrases.usageEn: When interrupting or asking someone who’s busy.
phrases.whenToUseEn: If you’re breaking someone’s focus or peace.

phrases.usageRu: Когда хотите узнать состояние собеседника с уважением.
phrases.usageEn: To politely inquire how someone is doing.
phrases.whenToUseEn: After a greeting in formal or respectful tone.

phrases.usageRu: При прощании с кем-то старше или официально.
phrases.usageEn: Used for formal goodbyes.
phrases.whenToUseEn: When parting respectfully from someone older or in a formal context.

phrases.usageKz: Жақын арада тағы кездесуге үміт білдіру.
phrases.whenToUseRu: Когда прощаетесь с ожиданием новой встречи.
phrases.usageEn: Used when you expect to see someone again.
phrases.whenToUseEn: Informal farewell implying future meeting.

phrases.usageEn: Said during long-term or final farewells.
phrases.whenToUseEn: Used when leaving for a long time or permanently.

phrases.usageRu: Во время прощания, с пожеланием здоровья.
phrases.usageEn: Used with a well-wish when parting.
phrases.whenToUseEn: To part ways while wishing good health.

phrases.usageEn: Used for farewells before travel.
phrases.whenToUseEn: When someone is departing on a journey.

phrases.usageKz: Адам демалуға кетіп бара жатса қолданылады.
phrases.usageEn: Used when wishing someone a pleasant break.
phrases.whenToUseEn: For weekends or vacations.

phrases.usageKz: Ұйқыға кетер алдында немесе кешкі қоштасу.
phrases.usageEn: Nighttime farewell, wishing good sleep.
phrases.whenToUseEn: When someone is going to bed.

phrases.usageKz: Ресми немесе үлкен адамға алғыс айтуда.
phrases.usageEn: Used to thank someone respectfully.
phrases.whenToUseEn: When showing formal or polite gratitude.

phrases.usageKz: Елеулі көмекке шын жүректен алғыс білдіруде.
phrases.usageEn: Used for heartfelt or deep gratitude.
phrases.whenToUseEn: When someone does something significant for you.

phrases.usageEn: Used when you want to express lasting gratitude.
phrases.whenToUseEn: When someone's help was especially meaningful.

phrases.usageKz: Ресми немесе жазбаша түрде жиі қолданылады.
phrases.usageEn: Used in formal or written communication.
phrases.whenToUseEn: When delivering official or public thanks.

phrases.meaningEn: Thank you from the bottom of my heart
phrases.usageEn: Used for sincere and emotional thanks.
phrases.whenToUseEn: When you're deeply touched or helped.

phrases.meaningEn: May your kindness return to you
phrases.usageEn: Used to wish blessings in return for kindness.
phrases.whenToUseEn: To bless someone who helped you.

phrases.usageEn: Used when expressing appreciation.
phrases.whenToUseEn: To politely say you’re thankful.

phrases.example: Ауыр сөмкені көтеруге көмектесе аласыз ба?
phrases.usageEn: Used when asking for assistance.
phrases.whenToUseEn: When you need someone’s help.

phrases.whenToUseRu: Когда не поняли или не услышали.
phrases.usageEn: Used when you didn’t hear or understand.
phrases.whenToUseEn: When you need clarification or repetition.

phrases.usageEn: Used to make a polite request.
phrases.whenToUseEn: When making a gentle suggestion or request.

phrases.usageEn: Used when asking for information.
phrases.whenToUseEn: When asking someone to share something with you.

phrases.meaningEn: If you could spare some time...
phrases.example: Уақытыңызды бөлсеңіз, бір нәрсе сұрағым келеді.
phrases.whenToUseRu: Когда нуждаетесь во внимании или разговоре.
phrases.usageEn: Used to request someone's attention or time.
phrases.whenToUseEn: When needing someone’s time politely.

phrases.example: Кешіріңіз, мазалауға тура келді, бірақ көмектесе аласыз ба?
phrases.usageEn: Used before making a request out of the blue.
phrases.whenToUseEn: To politely preface a sudden request.

phrases.meaningEn: If it’s not too much trouble...
phrases.example: Сізге қиын болмаса, поштаны тексеріп беріңізші.
phrases.usageEn: Used to express humble and polite requests.
phrases.whenToUseEn: To sound non-demanding when asking a favor.

data.descriptionEn: These phrases are essential for travel situations and will help you communicate effectively while traveling.
data.descriptionRu: Эти фразы необходимы для путешествий и помогут вам эффективно общаться во время поездок.
data.descriptionKz: Бұл сөз тіркестері саяхат кезінде қажет болып, тиімді қарым-қатынас жасауға көмектеседі.

phrases.meaningEn: What time does the plane depart?
phrases.usageRu: Когда хотите узнать время вылета самолёта.
phrases.example: Кассирге: «Ұшақ қай уақытта ұшады?» деп сұраңыз.
phrases.usageEn: Used to ask about the plane departure time.
phrases.whenToUseEn: Before your flight to check the schedule.

phrases.meaningEn: Where do I check in my luggage?
phrases.usageRu: Когда нужно узнать место сдачи багажа.
phrases.example: Әуежай қызметкеріне: «Багажды қайда тапсырамын?» деп сұраңыз.
phrases.usageEn: Used to ask where to check in luggage.
phrases.whenToUseEn: At the airport when checking in.

phrases.usageRu: На контроле безопасности или паспортном контроле.
phrases.usageEn: Used by officials to request your passport.
phrases.whenToUseEn: At security or passport control.

phrases.usageRu: Когда хотите забронировать номер в отеле.
phrases.example: Қонақүйдің қабылдауында: «Бөлме брондауға бола ма?» деп сұраңыз.
phrases.usageEn: Used to inquire about room booking.
phrases.whenToUseEn: When reserving accommodation.

phrases.usageKz: Қонақүйде немесе пәтерде интернет бар-жоғын білгіңіз келгенде.
phrases.usageRu: Когда хотите узнать о наличии интернета.
phrases.example: Қонақүй қызметкеріне: «Интернет бар ма?» деп сұраңыз.
phrases.usageEn: Used to ask about internet availability.
phrases.whenToUseEn: When checking amenities at accommodation.

phrases.usageKz: Қонақүйде немесе пәтерде төлем тәртібін білгіңіз келгенде.
phrases.usageEn: Used to ask about payment methods.
phrases.whenToUseEn: When settling bills or deposits.

phrases.meaningEn: What time does the bus arrive?
phrases.example: Автобус аялдамасында: «Автобус қай уақытта келеді?» деп сұраңыз.
phrases.usageEn: Used to ask about bus arrival time.
phrases.whenToUseEn: When waiting for public transport.

phrases.example: Қонақүй қызметкеріне: «Такси шақыра аласыз ба?» деп айтыңыз.
phrases.usageEn: Used to ask for calling a taxi.
phrases.whenToUseEn: When you need transportation.

phrases.usageKz: Көлік билетін сатып аларда бағасын білу үшін.
phrases.usageEn: Used to ask the price of a ticket.
phrases.whenToUseEn: When buying transport tickets.

phrases.example: Официантқа: «Мен мәзірді көргім келеді» деп айтыңыз.
phrases.usageEn: Used to request the menu.
phrases.whenToUseEn: When you want to see food options.

phrases.usageKz: Асхана қызметкерінен тағам туралы кеңес сұрау.
phrases.usageRu: Когда хотите получить совет по блюдам.
phrases.usageEn: Used to ask for food recommendations.
phrases.whenToUseEn: When unsure what to order.

phrases.usageEn: Used to request the bill.
phrases.whenToUseEn: When ready to pay.

data.descriptionEn: These phrases should be used in daily life and you will use them most of the time.
data.descriptionRu: These phrases should be used in daily life and you will use them most of the time.
